PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - vis absorption spectra of POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers in a chlorobenzene solution or in a thin film state are shown in Figure 1a.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV - vis absorption spectra |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| chlorobenzene solution |
| thin film state |

Note: The entities in the paragraph can be recognized as follows:

* UV - vis absorption spectra: This is a property of the polymers, specifically the spectrum of absorption of ultraviolet and visible light.
* POBDTPD and PEBDTPD: These are the names of the polymers being studied.
* chlorobenzene solution and thin film state: These are the conditions under which the absorption spectra are measured.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV - vis absorption spectra |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties and were removed:

* POBDTPD and PEBDTPD (these are the names of the polymers being studied, not properties)
* chlorobenzene solution and thin film state (these are the conditions under which the absorption spectra are measured, not properties)
